descriptionHTML:
Weather is exceptionally easy to use app for staying always updated with the weather conditions.

The Weather app is specifically designed to be as simple and intuitive as possible. With just one click you receive the weather condition in your status bar at your current location.

The climate state is gorgeously animated so that you can almost experience it, seeing how the weather comes alive.

The app is using Weather Underground as a data channel and the live updates are really tiny so that you would not use up your data cap.

FEATURES

- Weather supports geo-positioning, retrieving the latest weather conditions for your current location

- An option to manually add your location

- Full support for Android TV

- Add and track the weather conditions in multiple locations

- Weather is one of the most lightweight weather apps on Google Play!

- Animated weather conditions - see how the weather comes alive!

- Widgets for different locations

- Hourly and weekly forecasts

- Intuitive, seamless user interface

- Support for the lock screen widget in Android 4.2

- Weather benefits all known screen resolutions

- Offers quality support for Android devices - from Android 1.5 to Android 5.0

- Tap on the temperature to switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit

- You can allow and disable the notifications

- Choose by yourself what will be the next feature of Weather! Leave a comment or send us an e-mail and help us make Weather the best app of its kind.

Get in touch with us and follow the latest news regarding our apps:
http://www.facebook.com/macropinch
http://twitter.com/macropinch

topReviews.reviewText: Just what I was looking for after my previous weather widget app kept freezing up. Only problem I have is it doesn't always change locations when I travel to the surrounding cities & suburbs in my area...hope this can be corrected... then I will give it 5 stars!
Can I access hourly forecast faster? Now I need to open app and swipe left. Very good app though. Sticking with it now
This is the only weather app that actually works!! I'm very happy about it.

A nice-looking, uncluttered and simple app. When the ad-free option was introduced, I wanted to buy it to get rid of the ads, but I won't pay more than a 3 Euro one-time fee, and they want more than that every year.
It's OK,  working but could be better graphics and choice of themes. Weather not always accurate.
Not had any problems as of yet. Although it's given high temperatures next week. So waiting on that to see how accurate it is
App works great and is light on myll phone. No bloated  nonsense.  Even can display on the lock screen
I like the simple picture and every thing but possibly you can make the widget picture bigger like 6x4 or so, but I love it!
Very good! Simple and accurate. Love the graphics showing temperature variations during the day!

With my line of work and travel, the ease of switching locations is great. I love the layout and the hour by hour. I also like the updating of current weather and conditions. They are always accurate, even more than my local weather man.

However, the widget is pretty useless. Only gives the current temp. I need a widget that lets me customizes it.  I need to change between cities, know the cuurent temp as well as what the temp feels like, humidity and a 3 or 5 day forecast all on the widget. Plus current date and time would be nice

It's very efficient, it works a lot better than weather widget. It is customizable, flexible, modern, user friendly, and once again effecient. I never even had to search for my city.       (It did that for me)
topReviews.reviewTitle: Very nice app, would recommend to anyone

topReviews.reviewText: pros: #1 lightweight, #2 simple, #3 clean graphics.  con: app shuts down every time i try to change settings. using a ZTE-brand Android.
topReviews.reviewTitle: love it, but settings makes problems

topReviews.reviewText: IF U WANT ACCURACY THEN DON'T USE THIS APP ! IT USE TO BE VERY ACCURATE UNTILL LAST UPDATE ! NOW IT SUCKS ! IT SAYS ITS 42. OUT WHEN IT'S REALLY ONLY 20 DEGREES! !!!!!! FIX IT !
Excellent app I would like to see more things for the background that would be nice to have more availability but it's accurate and the graphics are very easy to read
Great weather app. I recommend.
this app keeps on putting up a location 10km away from my actual location. it has a mind of its own. wont even put the right location even if i choose it
This is so much better than most of those weather so called application keep up the good work guys keep on making it better and better every day.

I love show this app fits my needs AND it's not bombarded with ads (I So Hate Ads but understand its purpose) Kudos to Macropinch developer!! I love my theme choice, the hourly temperatures, the temp curve w/sun & moon phase, & what the daily weather will be!! Thanks so much!! And yes it Is Stylish!!  ;-)

At first I loved the user interface, design, etcetera. But so far this morning, the weather shown has been about 5-7°C higher than reality here (Toronto), and that's a fairly significant variance and makes the app useless. I don't know where you source your weather information, but every other weather site or app I have seen today shows 12 degrees, while this shows 20. Update: Well, after I tried choosing Toronto City Centre rather than letting the app decide where I was (Toronto City), it works. So gee.
Very simple app for understanding and it shows accurate weather of city I'm really impressed by this app
Its not bad but the readings are taken at a wide open area and when I did weather for over 12yrs in fall winter and early spring I included wind chill
Just would like to ask if it is possible to add humidity and few other informations in widgets? Other than that is very ok. Thanks in advance.

...i don't have the feels like feature. I thought you maybe don't support feels like for my city but i have set it to london as it is in your pictures and it still doesn't show feels like. Please help!!
I love weather because you can see what it's gonna do and look like for the next week or so
All the have to do is add a clock to the widget so I don't have to use the stock one.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Best way to view the weather

topReviews.reviewText: Quite accurate & very low private access bonus id say Dev.  But seriously monthly subscription just remove Ads.  Er no.  May consider changing app.  Don't mind a one off payment but NOT Monthly
Easy format. Straight to the point and the basic weather. No bells and whistles but I love it.  Like the peak high temp/sunset chart.
This app is easy to use. The information is fairly accurate. I like being able to put in multiple cities. The graphics on the home screen are very good.
Its pretty accurate and user friendly. Best I've found so far.
I like that i can see the forecast without waiting for an internet connection being as i dont allways have service in my area
Its simple and shows hourly weather. Theres a constant icon of the temp on my homescreen. Which is what I wanted.
So far so great can't give 5 stars since I just started using it
Love the simple design and easy use
Good app . Gives correct temp for my location. Seems to be simpke and user friendly.
It's simple to use and read and MUCH more accurate than any of the meteorologists on TV and online. All of my family's phones have this app.

Macropinch does it again! But had to take 1 star off for average look. Ps. Sorry had to uninstall due to high battery use :( ##now reinstalled it remains still one of the most accurate in my country. PLEASE don't change weather providers like many are doing. They are a disaster in Aus! Ps. Love the update so far...
I love the new UI. It's very sleek and looks good!
Getting better. Keep it up!
Nice but no options to customise widget also add feature like 5 or 10 day widget

whatsNewHTML:
What's New

* Improved Android TV layout
* Now you can remove the ads inside the app
* Other fixes and improvements
